name: 黃明熙
objective: 課程概述與目標：電力電子電路之工作原理，數學模式分析，控制器分析與設計
schedule:
Week 1 :       Ch1. Introduction
Week 2~3:   Ch2. Principles of steady state  converter analysis 
Week 4 :      Ch3. Steady-state equivalent circuit modeling, losses, and efficiency
Week 5~6:   Ch4. Switch realization 
Week 7:       Ch5. The discontinuous conduction mode
Week 8:       Ch6. Converter circuit
Week 9 :      Mid. term exam.
Week 10~12: Ch7. AC equivalent circuit  modeling
Week 13~14: Ch8. Converter transfer functions
Week 15~16 Ch9. Controller design
Week 17:　  Ch 17. The ideal rectifier 
Week 18:     Final exam.
scorePolicy: 作業 (含 Simulation): 20%，期中考: 30%，期末考: 30%，其他：10%
materials:
*Robert W. Erickson and Dragan Maksimovic, “Fundamentals of power Electronics,” Kluwer Academic Publishers, 3rd version, 2020.
* 部分教材自編
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG7：可負擔的潔淨能源（Affordable and Clean Energy）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG13：氣候行動（Climate Action）
